overview: "Antartica Por Um Ano" is a feature-length documentary about the experience of a group of Brazilians who will remain for an uninterrupted year at the Comandante Ferra Antarctic Station (EACF), integrating the Brazilian Antarctic project linked to the Brazilian Navy. It is unique to the experience of these men and women who face, far from their families, the long and hard Antarctic winter, where temperatures on King George Island can reach below -25 Â° C and winds over 100 km / h.
title: Antartica Por Um Ano
